rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a minimalist Scandinavian design, featuring neutral tones and wooden accents.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for ample natural light, embodying the simplicity and functionality of Scandinavian style.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for comfortable family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an island counter and efficient layout; features Scandinavian design elements like white cabinets and wooden countertops.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom offering privacy and comfort, designed according to Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Functional bathroom with Scandinavian fixtures, ensuring easy access for guests.

openings.style: Minimalist door frame with wooden accents
Large glass panels allowing natural light
